sources.title: Why Change Your Wife?
sources.description: From IMDb : Robert and Beth Gordon are married but share little. He runs into Sally at a cabaret and the Gordons are soon divorced. Just as he gets bored with Sally's superficiality, Beth strives to improve her looks. The original couple falls in love again at a summer resort. Stars: Gloria Swanson, Thomas Meighan, and Bebe Daniels

metadata.Plot: Robert and Beth Gordon are married but share little. He runs into Sally at a cabaret and the Gordons are soon divorced. Just as he gets bored with Sally's superficiality, Beth strives to improve her looks. The original couple falls in love again at a summer resort.
metadata.Writer: Olga Printzlau, William C. de Mille, Sada Cowan
metadata.Actors: Thomas Meighan, Gloria Swanson, Bebe Daniels
